Uses of Class
tech_demo.TechDemo

  • Packages that use TechDemo 
    Package Description
    piano
    Constitues the logic used in the Piano demonstration
    tech_demo
    Implements the logic behind tech demonstrations used in the project.

    • Uses of TechDemo in piano

      Subclasses of TechDemo in piano 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Piano
      This class will implement a way to play piano directly from the launchpad, with proper keys displayed on it and instant audio (either will be samples or will send MIDI to an external MIDI compatible piano synthesizer - Pianoteq 2.2 - for even more close to real piano sound).

    • Uses of TechDemo in tech_demo

      Subclasses of TechDemo in tech_demo 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Animation
      Implements a couple of simple animations to be displayed on the Launchpad S.
      class  IdleAnimations
      This class will implement subtle animations that will play when the program has been running on the main GUI screen with no game or tech demo running for a while (probably 30 seconds).
      class  ScrollingText
      This class implements a way to display text on the Launchpad S.
